languages.text: Холодные каменные саркофаги служат культистам смерти спальными ложами. Пуховой периною служат им кости ушедших товарищей.
Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.
languages.original_text: Холодные каменные саркофаги служат культистам смерти спальными ложами. Пуховой периною служат им кости ушедших товарищей.

traits.locale_text: Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their duvets.

Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.

languages.text: Kalte Steinsarkophage dienen den Todeskultisten als Betten. Die Knochen ihrer verstorbenen Kameraden sind ihre Matratzen.
languages.original_text: Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.

traits.locale_text: Kalte Steinsarkophage dienen den Todeskultisten als Betten. Die Knochen ihrer verstorbenen Kameraden sind ihre Matratzen.

languages.text: Sarcófagos de fría piedra sirven como camas a los cultistas de la muerte. Los huesos de sus camaradas caídos son sus sábanas.
languages.original_text: Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.

traits.locale_text: Sarcófagos de fría piedra sirven como camas a los cultistas de la muerte. Los huesos de sus camaradas caídos son sus sábanas.

languages.text: 冷たい石の石棺は、死のカルトの信者たちの寝床として使われている。死んだ仲間の骨が、彼らの寝具となるのだ。
languages.original_text: Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.

traits.locale_text: 冷たい石の石棺は、死のカルトの信者たちの寝床として使われている。死んだ仲間の骨が、彼らの寝具となるのだ。

languages.text: 这些冰冷的石棺是拜死教教徒的床，死去战友的遗骨是他们的寝具。
languages.original_text: Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.

traits.locale_text: 这些冰冷的石棺是拜死教教徒的床，死去战友的遗骨是他们的寝具。

languages.text: Les cultistes de la mort ont pour lits des sarcophages de pierre glaciale. Les ossements de leurs défunts camarades leur servent ainsi de couchage.
languages.original_text: Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.

traits.locale_text: Les cultistes de la mort ont pour lits des sarcophages de pierre glaciale. Les ossements de leurs défunts camarades leur servent ainsi de couchage.

languages.text: Buz gibi taştan lahitler, ölüm tarikatçıları için karyola işlevi görür. Vefat eden yoldaşlarının kemikleriyse onların yataklarıdır.
languages.original_text: Cold stone sarcophagi serve as the death cultists' beds. The bones of their deceased comrades are their bedding.
